verbs.description: As [ARG0: Mr. Mueller] [V: takes] [ARG1: his time] [ARG2: building a possible case of obstruction of justice against the president] , Messrs. Trump and Giuliani are constructing a diversionary smokescreen of an FBI gone rogue .
